resources.string: What is the name of your primary school teacher?
Which city were you born in?
What’s the name of your primary school?
What’s the middle name of your father?
Account or password can not be empty
Here comes a new version, Update now?

Bluetooth® MiNi Massager adopting international leading technology, Send commands through the mobile phone Bluetooth module to control the host for a deep massage. The device adopt international advanced micro control chip technology and bluetooth technology, produce electronic pulse wave to Stimulate muscle, which make people to feel the feeling of tapping,kneading,pounding,tugging,pou&mox,complex , Effectively relieve fatigue, alleviate muscle pain and other symptoms. Anytime, anywhere, let you relax.
Please stand on the scales with bare feet!

You look great now! Please don’t be picky about food, and ensure daily nutritional balance. Take in more protein and dairy products, maintain adequate and good sleep and pleasure, With adequate exercise, you can build your muscles stronger and obtain a healthful physique.
Wow, your weight is so standard. You are a health envoy, please keep up the good work, make youself healthier and keep fit!
Dear, you are a little overweight. We suggest that you eat more fruit and take aerobics exercise. Adjust your diet, do more exercise and increase metabolic rate, you can become beautiful soon.
To keep your weight, you should eat less greasy food and do more exercise. Besides, you should your life and exercise regular. If you do so, you can be amazed by your good figure.
User number has reached top limit
\n1. Install the battery into the bluetooth scale, and ensure the screen can display correct weight

2.Use your mobile phone to scan the two-dimension code of bluetooth scale,download and install the software； 
3.Initiate bluetooth function of phone in the “settings” page 
4.Click the application； 
5.Enter “My Center”——“Setting Info”, input personal parameters, click "save" after the input is completed
6.Stand bare feet on the scale, then wait for test to be completed；
7.Leave the scale surface after data reception.

The software is used together with the Bluetooth Electronic Scale data are received from the scale and saved to different user groups. Use the graphsand lists to browse the historical data, store and share data.
Device requirements: Bluetooth version 2.1 and above\nAndroid 4.3 and above, IOS7.0 and above

Measurement data: data are received from the scale, including weight, body fat, visceral fat, bone content, muscle content, body water, basal metabolic rate, body mass index（When the user input height and weight, the body mass index value will come through health management experts and be calculated automatically）. \n user：Before your first measurement, please go to the “Personal Center” and enter your personal information.

1. Browse historical data by clicking on the “historical data” button of main interface； 
2. View all of the measured data by sliding historical curves； 
3. The line chart can be enlarged or diminished by using two fingers to slip on the screen. You can view the data by year or month while enlarging the line chart, and view the data by week while diminishing the line chart; 
4. Click on the node of the line chart, select the measurement date, then you can see daily data in a week and BMI below the historical curve. To see the daily detailed information, please click on the “Date” and check the detailed measurements
Shoulder stiffness: keeping a fixed posture for a long time leads to poor blood circulation and stiff shoulder. Stimulating Jianjing acupoint can effectively relieve shoulder tension and stiffness
Back stiffness: Sitting and holding still for too long leads to back pain. Stimulating Jianjing acupoint and Tianzong acupoint can effectively relieve back tension and stiffness.
Waist-ache: bad sitting posture or over fatigue easily leads to back pain. Stimulating Ashi acupoint and Shenshu acupoint can effectively relieve waist-ache.

Relieve fatigue: Stimulating Neiguan acupoint can effectively relieve intense pressure and upset.\n Remove tiredness : long time standing or excessive excerise lead to calf muscle ache. Stimulating WeiZhong acupoint can effectively relieve calf muscle ache.
Do not sign out during measuring
Ensure device is open and close to the phone
Sorry!Your mobile phone temporarily does not support bluetooth 4.0 version!
Battery is low! Device will shutdown automatically after 30 seconds!
\nA. Open the box, install patch to the device, and then put the patch on wherever is unwell in your body
B. Press the device power switch

C. Open the bluetooth function in the "Settings". Click the icon on the desktop. After entering the software interface, the system will search the bluetooth portable devices automatically as shown in figure 2.

D. After opening the device which is already matched , it will finish the connection steps automatically, as shown in Figure 3. \n※In order to avoid confusion about which device is controled by which phone, do not open more than two devices at the same time when matching connection. After the match, mobile phones and the device will be one-to-one binding. The phone will only match the device which is matched at the very first time. If you want to change the current binding device, please enter "set interface - change device” to set.
E. Enter the main interface, select the mode, press the button and begin to experience

There are “off ” , “Start/pause”,“MiniShutoff”,“Mode”,“+”,“-”button on the operation interface.
 
 1."Off"button—shutdown device. When using again, you need to press the switch on the device manually 
 2. Button—Click once, the device suspends the output. If you click on any pattern or gear switch, you can’t get any reaction because the function is not effective; When clicked again, the device regain model and gear continue to work 
 3.Click on the button, device can switch to change the mode to tap，knead，pound，tug，pou&mox，complex 
 4. “Strengthen”button — Click once, output can strengthen a level from 1 to 10. 
 5.“Weaken”button—Click once, output can weaken a level from 1 down to 0.
F. Choose the appropriate mode by pressing the function adjustment button. The weakest strength is Level 0. Users can adjust to the appropriate state.

G. After relaxing, please click on the "off" button on the interface, or close the device switch, and then remove the patch from the device. Cover the patch with protective film to prevent from dust and dampness

1. If the bluetooth can not connect, please check to see if the battery is in the device, and then restart the APP as well as the device. System will search and connect again automatically. 
2. When a call comes in, the phone will exit the operating interface automatically. The device will still be running; After answering the call, your phone comes back to operation interface and device continues to work. 
3. In the process of on-line operation, if software fails to search for available device within 10 seconds, operation interface will be prompted to “Please make sure that the device is turned on and close to the mobile phone”.Then, please confirm that the battery is not running out, and the distance between mobile phone and device is within the effective range. 
4. Device will shut down detecting no output within 15 minutes. Please restart the device if you want to use again. 
5. Lights instructions
In order to achieve the best therapeutic effect, users can refer to the corresponding acupoints paste plate by using guide interface

To detect different devices , users can set the name of the current device in the “setting” interface. When the phone needs to connect another device, enter“setting——change device”, search to the corresponding device name shown in Figure 7, the press the name of device. The software will match the device automatically.
* Wireless intelligence\n* mini portable\n* Environmental-friendly and Energy-saving

Device adopt international advanced micro control chip technology and bluetooth technology, produce electronic pulse to Stimulate muscle, which lead to feeling of tap,knead,pound,tug,pou&mox,complex. Effectively relieve fatigue, alleviate muscle pain and other symptoms
Charging 2.5 hours, continuous use of more than 20 hours
Android 4.3 or IOS7.1 above , and include the bluetooth function

Taboos 
 1. People use a pacemaker or other life-prolonged medical electronic instrument are prohibited to use this product. 
 2. High-risk patients are prohibited to use this product. 
 3. Cannot be used in the wound, vulnerable points or infection on the activity of the skin 
 4. Female menstrual period, pregnant women, allergies are prohibited to use this product 
 5. Two patches must not be pasted together while using 
 6. Not recommended for charging while relaxing 
 7. Do not use the product while flying 
 8. Do not use USB cable to connect the computer to recharge 
 9. If not use for a long time, please close the power.
\u3000\u3000To ensure that you have weared the tonometer Turn on the tonometer referring to following picture.
